'''Steak''' is a [[food]] [[item]] obtained by cooking [[raw beef]]. Steak and [[cooked porkchop]]s restore the most [[hunger]] out of all [[stack]]able foods.

== Obtaining ==
=== Mob loot ===
{{Drop sources|Steak}}

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|cooked-beef}}

=== Cooking ===
Raw beef can be [[cooked]] in a [[furnace]], [[smoker]], or [[campfire]]. Each steak removed from a furnace output slot gives 0.35 [[experience]] (22.4 experience per stack).
{{Smelting
|Raw Beef
|Steak
|0,35
}}

=== Villager gifts ===
{{IN|java}}, [[Trading#Butcher|butcher]] [[Villager|villagers]] may give players steak if they have the [[Hero of the Village]] status effect.

== Usage ==
=== Food ===
To eat steak, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Eating one restores {{hunger|8}} [[hunger]] and 12.8 hunger [[Hunger#Mechanics|saturation]].

=== Wolves ===
Steak can be used to [[breed]] and heal tamed [[wolves]], lead them around, and make baby tamed wolves grow up faster by 10% of the remaining time.
